WorkItem.Description:
I don't know if this is the right place, but here we go.

I simply cannot install this from Nuget. I allways receive the error "Could not install package 'ModernChart 1.0.0'. You are trying to install this package into a project that targets '.NETFramework,Version=v3.0', but the package does not contain any assembly references that are compatible with that framework. For
 more information, contact the package author".

Yes, I tryed with all target framework version, starting 4.5 down to 3.0 (not tested 2.0).

Is it a old package? Am I missing something?
Can anybody please help?

Thanks in advance!

Comments.Message: Same here, i cant to install this Modern UI from nuget

I noticed that the nuget package is not maintained by the author of this project. Ugh. 

So... either we can create a new package for it, or better yet, hopefully @torman119 will start releasing it as a nuget package for us.
